basics.name: Liam Schenk
basics.label: Mediamatics Apprentice
basics.summary: Hi, I’m Liam, a Mediamatics apprentice at Swisscom. I’m passionate about graphic and poster design, and I love learning new things, especially when it comes to web design. In my free time, you’ll probably find me listening to music or podcasts, picking up inspiration along the way.

work.name: Swisscom
work.summary: During my apprenticeship as a Mediamatics professional, I have worked in various departments at Swisscom and gained experience in all areas of multimedia.
highlights: I have led various multimedia projects and contributed to video and photo productions.
I have designed and implemented physical products.
I have gained experience in web design and acquired knowledge in various CMS and website builders.

volunteer.summary: In August 2023, I assisted with both First Steps at Swisscom, where I introduced new apprentices to the company and provided them with important information and useful tips.
highlights: I guided and supported the new apprentices in setting up their IT devices.
I gave presentations on various topics and shared my knowledge.

volunteer.summary: At Motion, we conducted and recorded an interview with Heinz Frei in collaboration with Pascal Schwendimann. We also hosted a livestream for the event.

projects.name: Rirekisho — Next.js Web Template
projects.description: I created a simple resume template using Next.js, designed for beginners. It uses a resume.json file to display basic info including projects, work, and education — perfect for those starting to build their personal website.
highlights: Built with Next.js for fast performance and SEO optimization
Fully customizable design to fit personal branding
Responsive design, looks great on both desktop and mobile

projects.name: Point of Sales — Print Products
projects.description: At POS, I manage the decoration tour process in a team and handle the associated blog for the Swisscom shops. Additionally, I occasionally design print media. A selection of this work can be found below.

projects.name: Point of Sales — Glücksmaschine
projects.description: For the Glücksmaschine, I created an animation and a screensaver. Customers could participate in the shop by scanning a QR code and win prizes.
